New Records: Jason Holder took 4 wickets for 7 runs in the match.
Brandon King scored 52 runs in the match.
Key Match Events: England collapsed to 49 for 7 early in their innings.
West Indies achieved a nine-wicket victory with 17 balls to spare.
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies' skipper Kieron Pollard mentioned the team's motivation from their previous series against Ireland.
England captain Eoin Morgan noted the challenge of adapting to the pitch conditions.
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Jason Holder praised the team's effort and mentioned the loss to Ireland in the previous series.
England captain Eoin Morgan acknowledged the need for a new game plan for the next match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the first of a five-match series.
The second match is scheduled for Sunday.
